parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name. Separate multiple domain names with commas (,).

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description:
The interval at which data is to be queried. Unit: seconds. Valid values:

*   **300** (default value)
*   **3600**
*   **86400**

> 
*   If you do not set this parameter or the specified value is invalid, the default value **300** is used.
*   If you set this parameter to **300**, the average number of bits that are transmitted per second within 300 seconds is returned.
*   If you set this parameter to **3600** or **86400**, the maximum of the average bandwidth for each interval of 300 seconds within the specified query interval is returned.

parameters.name: IspNameEn
parameters.description: The name of the Internet service provider (ISP). To query ISPs, call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation.

parameters.name: LocationNameEn
parameters.description: The name of the region in which you want to query data. To query regions, call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
